content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump (position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and pipe group connecting them.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-82.0)

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Research lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_POWER

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the item you are trying to insert exists in the game and is correctly referenced in your code.
-  Make sure the entity you are trying to insert into can accept the item.
-  Check if the entity has available space for the item.

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure the entities you are trying to connect are compatible and can be connected.
-  Check if the entities are in the correct positions and have the required items in their inventory.
-  Make sure the connection points of the entities are correctly aligned.

### Errors when using prototypes
-  Ensure the prototype you are trying to use exists in the game and is correctly referenced in your code.
-  Check if the prototype has the required attributes and methods.

### Errors when checking entity attributes
-  Ensure the entity attribute you are trying to access exists and is correctly referenced in your code.
-  Check if the entity has the required attributes and methods.
